transcript:
caller: Hello!
frosty: Well, hello! Who's spreading holiday cheer with me today?
caller: I'm Max from Sydney.
frosty: Hello, Max! Can you tell me what's on your wish list this holiday?
caller: Hmm, I am not sure. I guess I like cars.
frosty: We have a fun Bluey car. It's very cool. And also, there's a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles pizza delivery van! It's really fun.
caller: Oh, the bluey car sounds cool.
frosty: Great choice, Max! By the way, how do you plan to celebrate the holiday season with your family?
caller: We're going to the beach! It's summer here in Sydney.
frosty: Oh, that sounds wonderful, Max. So, we will put the Bluey car on your holiday wish list, okay?
caller: Yes, please!
frosty: It’s all done. I hope your holiday is filled with joy and fun!
name: Max

transcript:
caller: Hi, Frosty
frosty: Hello there, bundle of joy! Can you share your name?
caller: I'm Lily.
frosty: Hello, Lily! And where are you calling from?
caller: I'm from London.
frosty: Beautiful London! Now, Lily, what are your two most wished toys this holiday season?
caller: I think I want the furby and... or maybe the transformers bumblebee. I can't decide.
frosty: Both are fascinating choices, Lily! Why are you interested in these toys?
caller: I like furby because it can talk, and transformers bumblebee because I like robots.
frosty: How about we put both on your wish list for now and you can decide later?
caller: Yes, let's do that.
frosty: Alright, Lily, both toys are now on your wish list. Enjoy your holiday and stay joyful!
name: Lily
toy_list: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee

transcript:

transcript:
frosty: Hello there! I'm Frosty, how can I add some sparkle to your holiday season?
caller: Hi Frosty! I'm Billy from Denver, United States.
frosty: Hi Billy! It's great to hear from you. What brings you to me today?
caller: Well I'm trying to decide which toy I'd like to ask for.
frosty: That sounds exciting! What options are you contemplating?
caller: Well I've always been a fan of transformers. But the new barbie dreamhouse is also very tempting.
frosty: Wow! Both are excellent choices. What does the holiday season mean to you and your family?
caller: We usually just spend a lot of time together, play games, eat good food, and exchange gifts.
frosty: That sounds lovely. Considering that, what about the trasformers bumblebee or the new barbie dreamhouse do you find interesting? 
caller: I like the fact that the bumblebee can transform. But I like how the dreamhouse has so many rooms.
frosty: Great to hear that Billy. Now, just a random question. What do you usually do for fun?
caller: I love to read adventure novels.
frosty: Aha! Maybe the bumblebee transformer, being an action character, could be brought to life in your adventure stories. What do you think?
caller: You're right! I'd pick the transformers bumblebee then.
frosty: Excellent choice, Billy! And just to be sure, you're finalizing on the transformers bumblebee, right?
caller: Yes frosty!
frosty: That's wonderful, Billy! We're so happy to make your holiday brighter. Expect your transformer bumblebee and have a magical holiday!
name: Billy
toy_list: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee

transcript:

caller: Hi, Frosty! I'm Liam from Auckland.
Frosty: Hi there, Liam from Auckland! How old are you?
caller: I'm 7.
Frosty: Great! Do you know what toys you’d hope to get this special season?
caller: I'd like a lola droid, please!
Frosty: Star Wars LOLA animatronic droid, fantastic choice! What draws you towards this droid?
caller: I like Star Wars, and the droids are cool!
Frosty: They are indeed! Do you want any other toy or a droid friend?
caller: Hmm, maybe a robot dog. That sounds cool too!
Frosty: You'll love the Dog-E! So, we have Star Wars LOLA animatronic droid and Dog-E. Does this list sound great to you?
caller: Yes! Thank you, Frosty!
Frosty: It's my pleasure, Liam! Have a great time!
name: Liam

transcript:
caller: Hi, there!
frosty: Hello there! It’s frosty! How can I help you today?
caller: Hi Frosty, I'm Mike from London.
frosty: Hi Mike! London is a wonderfully bustling city. So, what can I assist you with?
caller: I want a new toy but I'm not sure what to get.
frosty: That's totally alright, Mike. We can figure that out together! Tell me, what are some of your hobbies?
caller: I like playing with my dog.
frosty: That sounds fun! Maybe you would like a pet toy like robot dog.
caller: Yeah! That sounds cool! And can I also get trasformers bumblebee?
frosty: Of course, Mike! That sounds like a fantastic choice. The Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee is pretty exciting. But, why are you interested in this toy?
caller: I watch the movie and I like it a lot.
frosty: That sounds great, Mike! It really looks like you’d have a blast with Dog-E and the trasformers bumblebee. I have them added to your wish list, is that okay?
caller: Yes, that's perfect. Thank you, Frosty!
frosty: You're welcome, Mike! Happy holidays!
name: Mike
toy_list: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee

transcript:
caller: Hi, Frosty
frosty: Hello! How can I make your day brighter?
caller: I'm Ben, I live in Chicago. I would like to add two toys to my wish list.
frosty: Hello Ben from the Windy City! What toys are you interested in?
caller: I heard my cousin talk about the new barbie dreamhouse. Can I get that and short circuit set?
frosty: Ben, great choices! The Barbie Dreamhouse 2023 and the Snap Circuits: Junior. Why are you interested in these toys?
caller: The dreamhouse is for my sister. And I want the short circuit set because I like electronics.
frosty: That's fantastic, Ben. What a thoughtful brother! And it's great that you like electronics! You'll definitely enjoy Snap Circuits: Junior. Shall I go ahead and confirm these for you?
caller: Yes, please. Thank you Frosty!
frosty: You're welcome Ben, and have a wonderful holiday!
name: Ben

transcript:
caller: Hello, My name is Jake.
frosty: Hi Jake! It's a pleasure to assist you. Where are you calling from?
caller: I'm from Auckland, New Zealand.
frosty: Hi Jake! Auckland is a beautiful city. How may I help you today?
caller: I can't decide between the baby bee doll and the fox plushie... Maybe the fox... No, the baby bee... I can't decide!
frosty: That's alright, Jake! Both the Orijin Bees Lovey Coiley Baby Bee and the 2023 Holiday Fox 12-Inch Plush are fantastic toys. But let me ask, do you have a preference between dolls and plushies?
caller: I guess I like plushies a bit more.
frosty: Sounds like the 2023 Holiday Fox 12-Inch Plush might be a great choice! So, we will go with fox plushie. Is there another toy you would like to include in your wish list?
caller: Umm, Could I get the trasformers bumblebee?
frosty: You've got it Jake! The Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee is also added to your wish list. Sound good?
caller: Yes, that sounds perfect! Thank you Frosty.
frosty: You're welcome, Jake! Happy holiday!
name: Jake
toy_list: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee

transcript:
frosty: Hello there, happy holidays! My name is Frosty. May I know your name? 
caller: I'm Amy from Chicago.
frosty: Pleasure to meet you, Amy from Chicago! Are you excited about the holiday season? 
caller: Yes, I love the holidays! There are lights everywhere and I get to play with my friends a lot.
frosty: That sounds lovely. Now, what's on your wish list this year, Amy?
caller: I'm not sure. I kinda want a barbie science doll set or a furby.
frosty: Both excellent choices, Amy! Why are you drawn to these two toys?
caller: I like the barbie set because I like science. But the furby seems fun too because it talks.
frosty: Interesting! Sounds like you prefer interactive toys! Out of the two, which one do you feel more excited about? 
 caller: Hmm, probably the barbie science doll set. I think it will be fun doing experiments. 
frosty: Wonderful choice, Amy! So, we'll put one Barbie Science Lab Playset for you. Should I add anything else or confirm this order?

frosty: Great! Enjoy the holidays and have lots of fun with your new Barbie Science Lab Playset, Amy!

caller: Hi Frosty! I'm Lizzy. 
frosty: Hi Lizzy, lovely to have you on the line. Where are you calling from? 
caller: I'm calling from Sydney, Australia. 
frosty: That's wonderful, Lizzy. Now, let's make your holiday wishes come true. What would you like as your special gifts? 
caller: Hmm, I like the elmo plushie and the bluey car. 
frosty: A Sesame Street Monster Meditation Elmo and a Bluey Convertible and Figures, sounds splendid! So, Lizzy, why does the elmo plushie appeal to you? 
caller: Elmo is my favorite character and I love the show! 
frosty: That's lovely, and how about the bluey car? 
caller: It looks cool and I love to play with cars, especially with my brother. 
frosty: Sounds like some fun times are just around the corner! How are you and your family planning to celebrate the holiday season? 
caller: We are planning to have a big family dinner and then play some games. 
frosty: That sounds like a tremendous amount of fun! Alright, Lizzy. To confirm, that's a Sesame Street Monster Meditation Elmo and a Bluey Convertible and Figures. Are you happy with those choices? 
caller: Yes, I am! 
frosty: Alright, sweetie. Thank you for your call and have a wonderful holiday season, Lizzy!
name: Lizzy

transcript:
frosty: Welcome, sunshine! I'm Frosty. May I know your name? 
caller: Hi, Frosty! I'm Tom. 
frosty: Hi there, Tom! It's a pleasure to hear from you. Where are you calling from? 
caller: London, England. 
frosty: Excellent, Tom. So, do you have anything particular in mind you'd like for the holiday season gift? 
caller: Hmm, I want the trasformers bumblebee and the spiderman playset. 
frosty: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee and Marvel's Spidey and His Amazing Friends Web Spinners playset! Great Choices! Why are you interested in these toys, Tom? 
caller: I love action figures! I always enjoy playing with them. 
frosty: And how will you celebrate the holiday season, Tom? 
caller: My family's planning for a small gathering with my cousins. We'll have fun playing games too. 
frosty: Sounds great! So, Tom. Just to be sure, you've picked Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee and Marvel's Spidey and His Amazing Friends Web Spinners playset. Are these the perfect ones? 
caller: Yeah, they are perfect! 
frosty: Splendid! Looking forward to bringing some holiday joy to you, Tom!
name: Tom
toy_list: Transformers Rise of the Beasts Beast-Mode Bumblebee
Marvel's Spidey and His Amazing Friends Web Spinners playset

transcript:

frosty: LeapFrog Magic Adventures Microscope, a fantastic choice! Why does this toy interest you?

caller: My favourite memory is when my family and I built this huge snowman in our backyard. It was so much fun!

caller: Yes, that's correct!

transcript:

frosty: That's a lovely place, Bella! Let's discuss what you'd love to have as your holiday gift? 
caller: I'm wondering between the new barbie dreamhouse... or maybe the mickey playset... Oh, but furby sounds fun too... I don't know... Can you help me decide, Frosty? 
frosty: Well, all three are fantastic choices, Bella. Barbie Dreamhouse 2023 would give you the chance to create so many stories and memories. Fisher-Price Little People Mickey and Friends Playset could be perfect for you if you love Mickey and his friends! And the Furby interactive plush toy can be loads of fun and interactive! What are you most attracted to? 
caller: I think I like the Barbie Dreamhouse more. 
frosty: The Barbie Dreamhouse 2023 it is then! Now, may I know why this particular toy? 
caller: I can play and imagine so many fun stories with it! 
frosty: Absolutely, Bella! That sounds wonderful. So, Barbie Dreamhouse 2023 is your choice, right? 
caller: Right! 
frosty: Excellent choice, Bella! I'm sure you'll have exciting times with your new gift. Happy holidays!
name: Bella

transcript:

transcript:
caller: Hello?
frosty: Hi! Welcome to the holiday toy hotline! My name is Frosty. What's your name?
caller: My name is Isabella! I'm from New York City.
frosty: Wonderful, Isabella! Thanks for calling us. What can I help you with today?
caller: I want to choose something from the toy list, I love barbie dolls.
frosty: That's great! We have the Barbie Science Lab Playset and the new Barbie Dreamhouse 2023. Which one would you prefer?
caller: Hmmm, it's hard to decide. Tell me more about the barbie science doll set.
frosty: The Barbie Science Lab Playset is a fun set where Barbie can conduct experiments and learn about science. It includes lab furniture, tools, and a microscope! What do you like about science, Isabella?
caller: Science is so cool! I like learning about animals and nature.
frosty: That's wonderful! What are you and your family planning to do to celebrate the holiday season?
caller: We're going to visit my grandparents in another city and have a big family dinner.
frosty: That sounds lovely! And what is your favorite part of this time of the year?
caller: I love to see all the lights and decorations around the city.
frosty: That is such a delightful sight! Now, back to your toy list, are you leaning more towards the Barbie Science Lab Playset?
caller: Actually, can you tell me more about the new barbie dreamhouse?
frosty: Of course! The new Barbie Dreamhouse 2023 is a magnificent three-story house with fun features like a rooftop pool, slide, and an elevator. It's perfect for imaginative play!
caller: Wow, that sounds amazing! I want the new barbie dreamhouse instead.
frosty: You got it! I'll add the Barbie Dreamhouse 2023 to your holiday wish list. Have a fantastic holiday, Isabella!
caller: Thank you so much, Frosty! Goodbye!
frosty: You're welcome, Isabella! Goodbye and happy holidays!
name: Isabella
